website_summaries.verdict: Your dog will jog the first time and every time, guaranteed according to the manufacturer. Good way to exercise your dog quickly and at your own pace.
pros: Fits all bikes and keeps dogs in safety zone alongside bike
Hooks up easily and partially to bike pedal to feel where dog is at all times
Has safety feature if dog breaks free or if there's an accident
Dogs take to it like a fish out of water
cons: May not be good for dogs that don't use a leash
Better for bigger dogs and could break over time with excessive use

customer_reviews.title: Great until it broke
customer_reviews.text: It was a great addition to our ride. Taking my dog out with a regular leash resulted in too many close calls. Less than two weeks in, however, one of the clasps broke, rendering it all useless.
customer_reviews.author: NYC

customer_reviews.title: Breakaway released on second use...dog only 45lbs
customer_reviews.text: The breakaway released second time I used the product. Thankfully no cars were near. Have a very upset neighbor though :( Attached a removable chainlink and am crossing fingers. Wanted to love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for awhile now, so able to post a review. Works well. Only issue is that it is a bit long so my dog still reaches the front tire even with it adjusted to shortest length. Of course, she is a big dog, so that might play into it. She did sidetrack a few times at first to chase something, but the response of the leash bungee brought her quickly back next to me without any loss of control of the bike. Would highly recommend this as bike remains stable even if dog pulls off to side.
customer_reviews.author: WildHorses

customer_reviews.title: For my Brittany puppy, this has been a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love the doggerjogger. Installs and uninstall in a few minutes with ease. My 6 month old Brittany puppy learned within a few minutes how to run alongside the bike. The placement of the cords keeps her centered in the middle of the bike so she can't run in front of the front wheel and cause an accident. I highly recommend this to everyone I meet who wants to bike with their dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome company and awesome customer service! !!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very energetic 1 1/2 year old husky that loves to chase squirrels, rabbits and birds. I took him out on the doggerjogger and was kind of nervous but he isn't able to pull at all! He is able to get a great workout and when we see other dogs he is so focused on running he doesn't seem to want to chase anything. This product is awesome and it's obvious that the company cares about their customers. I've recommended it to everyone I know with a dog and a friend has already bought one even though they don't have a bike yet.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our very energetic Blue Heeler puppy. It wears him "out". I was concerned with how much he wants to control things, but he caught right on, and even when he tries to stray, I am able to keep control and redirect him. This is the best $ I've spent on this puppy, exponentially! He gets a morning and an evening jog...I can run him for twenty minutes and he's sacked out. I don't run, so this is the greatest thing ever. I only wish I could do this with him in the winter...awesome product...I highly recommend it if you need to get a serious run in with your pup, but you don't run.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenDance

customer_reviews.title: Love it- Aussie Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts when I first say the product as it seems like it would end in a tangled mess but I was completely wrong! It works great! Easy to attach to bike, took me less than 2 min. Hooked up my 45lb Aussie and she had it down right away and loves it. Took the bike and dog to busy national park with tons of people, dogs and cars on the first day out, no issues everything worked great. Will be buying another for my other bike and dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Super safe bike riding with a dog!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! My dog easily acclimated to the DoggerJogger, reinforced with a few treats. She trots along at an easy pace. We even had an encounter with another dog that was off leash and ran over to see my dog. There was a little tugging on the DoggerJogger, as my dog tried to stop to react. However, I was able to easily control the bike without being pulled over!!! I was soooo happy that this product really works!! Easy to install as well. Great design, i recommend it for the bike rider & dog safety.
customer_reviews.author: SavvyShopper

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING! I have a goldendoodle who seems to have a never-ending supply of energy. Walking her is great but I love riding my bike and have always felt guilty going without her. I have been looking for some way to take her along and decided to give this leash a try and I'm so happy I did!! The first ride we went on she leaned away for a bit but did a great job keeping up! Her tail didn't stop wiggling until long after we were done.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger Lily

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this item.
customer_reviews.text: Totally would recommend I was worried it wouldn’t work since my dog is very energetic. But such a great little tool prevent him from pulling me off my back and getting the excersice he needs!!!!
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bike leash option
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Super easy to install - took about 5 mins to learn and install - and pops off easily if you want to use it as a leash during the bike ride. Our Beagle is stubborn and is well controlled by the DoggerJogger.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just put this on my bike and tried it for the first time with my scardy cat Border Collie. It went swimmingly, she trotted with me perfectly from the start, I had her harness on just in case, and took it off within minutes. I think this is a great product, quality built and great materials. I foresee many years of happily riding with my baby beside me
customer_reviews.author: Debi3735

customer_reviews.title: It works just as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Doggerjogger. It was on my bike in a flash, my dog didn’t pull, we turned corners easy with no chance of getting tangled. I’m 70 years old and it’s a great wya to exercise my dog. I do attach the leash to a harness and not the dogs collar. I just feel I don’t any pulling on het neck. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Love my Dogger Jogger!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and customer service. My dogs are extremely high energy huskies. The Dogger Jogger is the best way to excercise your dog. A little ride around the neighborhood mellows them right out. Dogger Jogger also enables me to run errands and even grab a happy hour cocktail after work with my dog (places that would be too far to walk). It's super easy to attach to your bike and my dogs took right to it. The design is really genius. I am recommending Dogger Jogger to anyone who will listen. The only negative is how excited they get when the see my bike!
customer_reviews.author: marcus klump

customer_reviews.title: Just Love this jogger
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 40# Standard Schnauzer. This works so great. I love it. He can't forge ahead or lag behind (never a problem!) w/ the design of this leash. Just a very clever & effective/inexpensive bike jogger. All that see me w/ my dog are amazed at how slick it is. A few times he's jerked to try & see another dog for instance, but I am able to keep control without much problem. The pull is low enough on the bike that it's pretty stable. I don't know how it'd be with a large dog. I LOVE this leash.
customer_reviews.author: joanne c

customer_reviews.title: My dog and I LOVE it. As a note
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life-changer. My dog and I LOVE it. As a note, do not bike with total abandon, as the dog still can get in front of the bike if they try hard enough. I made this mistake and scraped up my dear doggo's paw when it got caught under the front tire. Fortunately, we were going very slowly and she was fine, but I'd be remiss if I didn't mention. Still absolutely a 5-star product.
customer_reviews.author: Taylore Becker

customer_reviews.title: Can't feel my dog pulling at all
customer_reviews.text: Color me impressed. I have a border collie who tends to forge ahead. I tried this and was pleasantly surprised. Even though I could see her putting pressure on the leash trying to run, I couldn't feel any change in the bike. She learned her position very quickly after that and responded to speed and direction changes without verbal cues. Bike rides will be much more enjoyable without having to worry about keeping her in the right position to avoid running into her.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! Love it for biking!
customer_reviews.text: Makes biking with my dogs heaven. The only problem is when they have to pee or poop while I'm biking and don't stop fast enough which has caused it to snap once but thankfully I could fix it instead of buying a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Grajeda

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a high energy dog
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with this product. my dog was a little scared on our first ride but she got used to it quickly. It helped to walk with her Attached to the bike for the first couple times before I rode the bike with her. Allowing her to run fast next to me gives her much better exercise than just going for a walk. It's easy to hook up and easy/safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AMAZING!!! My high energy Aussie took to this right away! At first he was a little confused as to what I was asking him to do with this setup and a bike but after we started to get going he caught on SO fast!! He loves it! And as someone who’s very insecure about riding bikes let along with a dog attached I felt very comfortable with this!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Quality with Affordability
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bike leash for my dog! She is a high energy 1 1/2 year old 45 lbs dog and this product allows her to run next to the bike, with safety for her and me. I use this leash daily, and have had it for over a month with now issues or complaints. Do not hesitate to purchase this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great bike leash!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with big dogs but come to find it doesn’t work with disc brakes so it only works on my road bike.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a second one thinking my daughter would like one also,but she had purchased something else for their dog. I love mome as does my pooch.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Lynn

customer_reviews.title: My Blue Heeler mix gets super excited when she realizes we are going for a ...
customer_reviews.text: My Blue Heeler mix gets super excited when she realizes we are going for a ride! In fact she pulls me forward because she is so excited to go! This is so easy to attach and remove. Keeps her by my side but not too close. Seems sturdy and doesn't mark up my bike or make me bolt anything. The only weird thing is that it attaches to the peddle. Doesn't mess with anything but feels kinda weird at first.
customer_reviews.author: zunelover

customer_reviews.title: ... stars earlier review because velcro break-away feature broke way easy and put dog in danger on 1st ride
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 4 stars earlier review because velcro break-away feature broke way easy and put dog in danger on 1st ride. Easy fix - put 4 zip ties around the velcro break away and no more issue. Best fix is make a secondary backup lanyard from paracord. 57 lb hound loves this set up but make sure you reward them with some sniff time or they get bored. Watch for ears near the front wheel and check their feet frequently, bring lots of water. Now I can cut her loose and she stays near the bike! Best new K9 invention! If I was younger...I would run twin hound power!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, it took less than 5 minutes for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, it took less than 5 minutes for my dog to get use to it. She is a large size dog that usually chases after anything that moves and after a few tugs she understood she was going nowhere and start running next to me all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Puig Vadillo

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I have a doberman pincher who has ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I have a doberman pincher who has way too much energy. I would not recommend a bike that requires a lot of balance though. Instead choose a bike with a heavy frame so that you aren't fussing when your dog decides to investigate something in another direction. This might be the best dog purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: Ronja R. Zigler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome leash
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I have a 80 pound labrador who I could see was trying to pull to the left to go sniff something, but couldn't. He eventually figured it out and ran straight with me. So nice to actually be able to ride with two hands and not worry about him running in front of my bike or pulling me over.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Easy and simple to use - no bulky and strange looking attachments!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and easy to use product. We use it all the time to exercise our lab puppy - he gets so excited when we ask if he wants to go on a "bike ride". Does the trick of tiring him out in a short amount of time yet doesn't tire us out! Because the strap is attached to the pedal you have a connection with your dog and can feel if he/she is tiring and slowing down. The placement of the straps prevents your dog from getting squished/hurt from the front wheel. Amazing customer service too!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Noodlebug

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fast arrival, great costumer service!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this product. My two cattle dog mixes are hard to keep exercised. The leash was extremely easy to install, especially with the how to videos on this website. I own a beach cruiser type bike with pedal brakes and I was still able to use it. My only regret is that I didn't find it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: It's great! I can run my 17 lb dog. My 10 year old can do it too. You do really have to keep an eye on the dog though. He still tries to lunge at other dogs and once he somehow flipped over the back tire and got a paw in the spokes. Luckily he was fine. We still love it. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KathyE

customer_reviews.title: Finally! I can safely take my extremely prey-driven dog ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally! I can safely take my extremely prey-driven dog for a ride w/o fear of her crossing in front of my bike or pulling off to the side. She does provide quite a bit of forward momentum though. I use this with a harness vs collar to avoid injury in case of sudden potty stops. :)
customer_reviews.author: jetravel

customer_reviews.title: Great incention
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use and works well. Much safer way to ride with a dog
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I got the doggerjogger after coming close to wrecking my bike while riding with my dog holding the leash. The doggerjogger allow me to by in control of the bike. The dog can pull all they want and it doesn't effect the bike. I tried it out with my 35pound Border Collie/Lab and my 50 pound American BulldogX. Both did wonderful and the Doggerjogger held up to them pulling as we road past a dog.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: good design but my small dog didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a good idea but my 16 pound dog didn't like it. Maybe it's better for a bigger dog. The design is good - even though my little guy was resisting the design of the leash prevented him from get run over by my bike. It a good design if your dog takes to it. Company is easy to deal with
customer_reviews.author: Casey K

customer_reviews.title: I want to like it...
customer_reviews.text: ...but the breakaway breaks away too easily for my 50lb lab. :(
customer_reviews.author: S. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: does what it says, doesn't pull my bike over when tries to jerk/stop to smell stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Boardman

customer_reviews.title: Both myself and my Springer love the DoggerJogger
customer_reviews.text: Both myself and my Springer love the DoggerJogger... she finally gets to run out her excessive energy. Great product and a breeze to install.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B.

customer_reviews.title: I attach it to my adult tricycle and it work fine so far
customer_reviews.text: I have two very active dogs,80lb and 45lb I was look for some type of leash I could attach to my Adult Tricycle, in my research I came across dogger jogger, I attach it to my adult tricycle and it work fine so far,this is our first time taking it out for a spin.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: Love it, works great!
customer_reviews.text: First ride, I love this thing. Easy to install once you can understand the directions. Got my crazy girl running to burn off some energy!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Behrens

customer_reviews.title: It'll work...
customer_reviews.text: Its ok for occasional use. Kinda cheap. Ok for smaller dogs. Definitely need a harness for this item if used. Don't think I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen V.

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: User error on our end. Called doggerjogger customer service. Bill explained how to fix the issue. He was a great help. Love the product.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: The doggerJogger was easy to set up and worked exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend to anyone who loves to ride their bicycle and wants to take their dog with them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcilina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bike leash for dog!
customer_reviews.text: Love that the center of gravity is low. Very safe and super easy to train your dog on, especially if they are good at walking on a leash.
customer_reviews.author: Lanae Mass

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This worked a dream! My dog loves to run but gets easily distracted by birds, people, other dogs... DoggerJogger keeps him in line and we can safely go for runs to burn off some energy.
customer_reviews.author: Tan Tan

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! My dog learned quick! Great product!!! Best bike leash around hands down! Wouldn't have anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Trent Lorenson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Even when lab pulls , I remain stable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MICHELE HEIDEN

customer_reviews.title: Attaches easily and quickly
customer_reviews.text: Love that it easily disconnects. I place my pup in her basket at various times during long rides. I unhook the dogger jogger ( takes a few seconds) and rehook it when she is ready to run along side me again. No long bars or cumbersome attachments to wrangle with.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ott

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product!!!! It is an amazing design and quality! My dalmatian needs extra exercise and this is the perfect way to get her tired out.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only issue is if your dog is a puller the back part can rub against your heel when you pedal. Not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Agygram

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My dog loves it and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Post

customer_reviews.title: Worked the first time and every time.
customer_reviews.text: Worked the first time and every time, just like the website said.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best exerciser for a Brittany puppy! He took to it immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Flundra

customer_reviews.title: not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I used this four times with my 1 year old.....on the 4th time it broke while riding...very disappointed. would never purchase again or recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Horniacek

customer_reviews.title: this product only works well for a dog that uses ...
customer_reviews.text: this product only works well for a dog that uses a leashes and is in shape to be able to run with the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Spring Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: I love it and so does my dog.  Also it works well for other dogie adventures
customer_reviews.text: I love using this with my 55lbs border collie mix. It works well and she loves to run. when she gets tired we use the leash to tie her in her Burley Trailwaggon so she can reposition herself and yet not escape.
customer_reviews.author: pet person

product_meta.title: DoggerJogger Bike Dog Leash
product_meta.description: Color:BlueThe DoggerJogger is the easiest way to jog your dog in the “safety zone” alongside your bike. It is the optimum method for exercising your dog quickly and at its own pace. You maintain control and proper speed while your dog jogs comfortably. The DoggerJogger attaches to your bike in two places: on the bike frame near the rear axle and at the pedal. The breakthrough design allows a two-point connection which maintains the dog’s position without hardware, brackets, bolts or tools! It snaps on your bike in seconds, the soft nylon straps will not damage or ding your paint or frame, and the beautiful nickel-plated hardware will shine brightly for years. When you arrive at your destination, the DoggerJogger snaps off the bike and is small enough to fit in your pocket! Or it becomes a standard leash. Or you can snap it to a post or tree without having to remove it from your dog’s collar. It’s SIMPLE at every stage! Most importantly, it connects to your dog’s collar at the proper angle for safety, and the elastic cord built into the leash gives your dog feedback about his position within the “safety zone.” In the event of an entanglement or mishap, the breakaway feature allows the dog to separate from the leash to avoid injury. Following your lead develops a stronger bond between your dog and its “pack leader,” you! The DoggerJogger is the simple solution to getting out, having fun and being active together!
feature_bullets: Your Dog Will Jog The First Time And Every Time, Guaranteed.
The DoggerJogger is EASY. No Tools.
Keeps Dog In Safety Zone Alongside Bike.
The DoggerJogger Attaches Low For Maximum Stability.
Soft Nylon Straps Protect Bike Frame and Fit All Bikes.
